Articles.Content:
Is there a mod to "retire" kerbonauts? If not, can I suggest that someone make one?

I don't want them taken away (the x button), just put in a different tab so that I can still see their Final Frontier (awesome mod) achievements, but not select them for missions.

Edited January 23, 2020 by SmarterThanMe

I'm no programmer, but I have long wished for more functionality in the astronaut office building-- viewing service records, administrative moves or rank/title assignments, maybe designation of primary and backup crews.  Retirement and vacation could fit there, too.  

Mostly role-playing stuff, but it'd be fun.
